problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,∠C=36°,将△ABC绕点A逆时针旋转60°得到△AED,AD与BC交于点F,则∠AFC的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = N_0, rotate △ABC anticlockwise around point A by N_1 to get △AED, AD and BC intersect at point F, then the degree of ∠AFC is ()
raw_answer: 试题分析:根据旋转图形可得∠FAC=60°,根据△AFC的内角和定理可得∠AFC=180°-36°-60°=84°.
